content: purls row 7- p1 ssp *k2 p2* repeat * for 12 sts k2tog repeat 3 times p1 ssk k1 *p2 k2* repeat * to end 7 sts decrease- 62 row 8- follow pattern knit the knits and purl the purls 4 row 9- k1 ssk *p2 k2* repeat * for 10 sts k2tog repeat 3 times p1 ssp *k2 p2* repeat * to end 7 sts decrease- 55 row 10- follow pattern knit the knits and purl the purls row 11- p1 ssp *k2 p2* repeat * for 8 sts k2tog repeat 3 times p1 ssk k1 *p2 k2* repeat * to end 7 sts decrease- 48 row 12- follow pattern knit the knits and purl the purls row 13- k1 ssk *p2 k2* repeat * for 6 sts k2tog repeat 3 times k1 ssp p1 *k2 p2* repeat * to end 7 sts decrease- 41 row 14- k1 ssk p2 k2 p2tog repeat 3 times k1 ssp p1 *k2 p2* repeat * to end 7 sts decrease- 34 row 15- k1 ssk p2 k2tog repeat 3 times p1 ssk k1 *p2 k2* repeat * to end 7 sts decrease- 27 row 16- *k2tog* repeat * to last st k1 14 sts cut long tail sew through last 14 sts and pull tight weave in ends 5 chart a chart b 6 chart c chart instructions charts read right to left start each row with chart a then b then c 7
